1 package io.redgreen.timelapse.extendeddiff
2
3 import io.redgreen.timelapse.extendeddiff.ComparisonResult.Added
4 import io.redgreen.timelapse.extendeddiff.ComparisonResult.Deleted
5 import io.redgreen.timelapse.extendeddiff.ComparisonResult.Modified
6 import io.redgreen.timelapse.extendeddiff.ExtendedDiff.HasChanges
7
8 private const val NEWLINE_CHAR = '\n'
9
10 @SuppressWarnings("LongMethod") 1/1
11 fun ExtendedDiff.toHtml(): String {
12   val result = (this as HasChanges).comparisonResults.first()
  val isAdded = this is HasChanges && this.comparisonResults.first() is Added
  val isDeletion = this is HasChanges && this.comparisonResults.first() is Deleted
  val isModified = this is HasChanges && this.comparisonResults.first() is Modified
13
14   return """
  return when {
    isAdded || isModified -> {
      val result = (this as HasChanges).comparisonResults.first()
​
      """
15         <html lang="en-US">
16         <head>
17             <style>
18               .added {
19                 background-color: #e6ffed;
20               }
21               .modified {
22                 background-color: #dbedff80;
23               }
24               .deleted {
25                 background-color: #ffdce0;
26               }
27             </style>
28         </head>
29         <body>
30         <table>
31             <tbody>
32             ${toRows(sourceCode, result)}
33             </tbody>
34         </table>
35         </body>
36         </html>
37   """.trimIndent()
    }
    isDeletion -> {
      val sourceCode = (this as HasChanges).sourceCode
      val deleted = this.comparisonResults.first() as Deleted
​
      """
        <html lang="en-US">
        <head>
            <style>
              .added {
                background-color: #e6ffed;
              }
              .modified {
                background-color: #dbedff80;
              }
              .deleted {
                background-color: #ffdce0;
              }
            </style>
        </head>
        <body>
        <table>
            <tbody>
            ${toRows(sourceCode, deleted)}
            </tbody>
        </table>
        </body>
        </html>
      """.trimIndent()
    }
    else -> TODO()
  }
38 }
39
40 private fun toRows(sourceCode: String, result: ComparisonResult): String {
41   return when (result) {
42     is Added -> toAddedRows(sourceCode, result)
43     is Deleted -> toDeletedRows(sourceCode, result)
44     is Modified -> toModifiedRows(sourceCode, result)
45   }
46 }
47
48 private fun toDeletedRows(sourceCode: String, deleted: Deleted): String {
49   val unmodifiedRowsNew = sourceCode
50     .split(NEWLINE_CHAR)
51     .mapIndexed { index, line ->
52       val lineNumber = index + 1
53       """
54         <tr>
55             <td>$lineNumber</td>
56             <td>${padStartWithNbsp(line)}</td>
57         </tr>
58       """.trimIndent()
59     }
60
61   val unmodifiedRows = offsetWithPadding(unmodifiedRowsNew)
62
63   val newDeletedRowsWithoutOffset = deleted.snippet.split(NEWLINE_CHAR).map { line ->
64     """
65       <tr class="deleted">
66           <td></td>
67           <td>$line</td>
68       </tr>
69     """.trimIndent()
70   }
71
72   val deletedRows = offsetWithPadding(newDeletedRowsWithoutOffset)
73
74   return """$deletedRows
75             $unmodifiedRows"""
76 }
77
78 private fun toModifiedRows(sourceCode: String, modified: Modified): String {
79   val lines = sourceCode.split(NEWLINE_CHAR)
80   val modifiedFunctionRange = modified.function.startLine..modified.function.endLine
81
82   val tableRows = lines.mapIndexed { index, line ->
83     val lineNumber = index + 1
84     val cssClassName = if (lineNumber in modifiedFunctionRange) "modified" else ""
85     """
86        <tr${classAttribute(cssClassName)}>
87            <td>$lineNumber</td>
88            <td>${padStartWithNbsp(line)}</td>
89        </tr>
90     """.trimIndent()
91   }
92
93   return offsetWithPadding(tableRows)
94 }
95
96 private fun toAddedRows(
97   sourceCode: String,
98   added: Added
99 ): String {
100   val lines = sourceCode.split(NEWLINE_CHAR)
101   val addedRange = added.function.startLine..added.function.endLine
102
103   val tableRows = lines
104     .mapIndexed { index, line ->
105       val lineNumber = index + 1
106       val cssClassName = if (lineNumber in addedRange) "added" else ""
107       """
108         <tr${classAttribute(cssClassName)}>
109             <td>$lineNumber</td>
110             <td>${padStartWithNbsp(line)}</td>
111         </tr>
112       """.trimIndent()
113     }
114
115   return offsetWithPadding(tableRows)
116 }
117
118 private fun classAttribute(cssClassName: String = ""): String {
119   if (cssClassName.isEmpty()) {
120     return ""
121   }
122   return " class=\"$cssClassName\""
123 }
124
125 private fun offsetWithPadding(tableRowSection: List<String>): String {
126   return tableRowSection
127     .joinToString("$NEWLINE_CHAR")
128     .split(NEWLINE_CHAR)
129     .mapIndexed { index, line ->
130       if (index == 0) {
131         line
132       } else {
133         " $line"
134       }
135     }
136     .joinToString("$NEWLINE_CHAR")
137 }
138
139 private fun padStartWithNbsp(line: String): String {
140   val prefix = line.takeWhile { it.isWhitespace() }
141     .map { "&nbsp;" }
142     .joinToString("")
143   return prefix + line.trimStart()
144 }
145
